message: I propose dividing the $10,000 into $7500 for me and $2500 for you. This offers a fair split considering the diminishing value of money with each round.
I'll give you a smaller share this round, but I'm willing to increase my share in future rounds if you accept this proposal.

Considering the inflation and previous offers, I propose a new division of $6000 for me and $4000 for you. This aims to provide a balanced compromise while acknowledging the diminishing value of money.
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share this round, but I'm still trying to maximize my gain in the long run.
